title: Add a vacation
content:
Every user can add their vacation to their personal schedule in Service Management. If you do this, it can help your manager stay up to date. In addition, this information is used for notification settings. For more information, see Notification settings.

On-call shifts are not automatically adjusted to reflect vacations. Users who are on vacation continue to appear in the on-call shift. Manually update the on-call shift to reflect their absence.

Who can manage vacations

The following users can create, edit, or delete a vacation for a user:

  • The user

  • The user’s manager

  • Users with the Tenant Admin role

Add a vacation

  1. Log in to Service Management using your credentials.
  2. Click the avatar in the menu bar and then select User profile. The Profile page is displayed.
  3. Click Schedule. Your schedule is displayed.
  4. Click Add vacation. The Vacation dialog box is displayed.
    1. Select a Start time and End time.
    2. Select All day event if applicable.
  5. Click Save.

To edit your vacation, navigate to the vacation in the schedule calendar, and click it. The Vacation dialog box is displayed. Edit the values as required. From here, you also can delete the vacation.
